lyrics:
You made me cry
When you said goodbye
Ain't that a shame
My tears fell like rain
Ain't that a shame
You' re the one to blame

You broke my heart
When you said we're apart
Ain't that a shame
My tears fell like rain
Ain't that a shame
You' re the one to blame

Oh well goodbve
Although I'll cry
Ain't that a shame
My tears fell like rain
Ain't that a shame
You' re the one to blame
